description: Comprehensive state program integrity (PI) review reports (and respective follow-up review reports) provide CMS assessment of the effectiveness of the states PI efforts, including its compliance with federal statutory and regulatory requirements. They also assist in identifying effective state PI activities which may be noteworthy and shared with other states. Focused PI review reports provide information on reviews conducted to examine specific areas of PI concern in one or more states.
title: State Program Integrity Review Reports List
